name: ComicBoom
description:
Try to find all 8 bombs before the timer runs out! Choose between four characters, but only the first has a superpower.

Hit Q to use throw teleball and Q again to teleport to its location.

Hit T to pick up bombs. 

Don't hit the street! Still a work in progress.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1jmVnlZPXTjL1sysxFE1NmstbadBeFF3W/view?usp=shari...
